trans-unit.source: Allure reporter (opens new window) is a tool to store and display test reports. It provides nice web UI which contains all important information on test execution. CodeceptJS has built-in support for Allure reports. Inside reports you will have all steps, substeps and screenshots.
trans-unit.target: 魅力报告者（在新窗口中打开）是存储和显示测试报告的工具。它提供了不错的Web UI，其中包含有关测试执行的所有重要信息。CodeceptJS具有对“魅力”报告的内置支持。在报告中，您将拥有所有步骤，子步骤和屏幕截图。

trans-unit.source: Allure reporter is a tool to store and display test reports. It provides nice web UI which contains all important information on test execution. CodeceptJS has built-in support for Allure reports. Inside reports you will have all steps, substeps and screenshots.

trans-unit.source: Protractor (opens new window) is an official tool for testing AngularJS applications. CodeceptJS should not be considered as alternative to Protractor, but rather a testing framework that leverages this powerful library.
trans-unit.target: Protractor（在新窗口中打开）是用于测试AngularJS应用程序的官方工具。CodeceptJS不应被视为Protractor的替代品，而应视为利用此功能强大的库的测试框架。

trans-unit.source: GraphQL helper (opens new window) allows sending GraphQL queries and mutations to application, over Http. This is a tool to make shortcuts and create your data pragmatically via GraphQL endpoint. However, it doesn't provide tools for testing the endpoint, so it should be paired with WebDriver, Nightmare or Protractor helpers for browser testing.
trans-unit.target: GraphQL助手（打开新窗口）允许通过Http向应用程序发送GraphQL查询和变异。这是一个制作快捷方式并通过GraphQL端点实用地创建数据的工具。但是，它不提供用于测试端点的工具，因此应与WebDriver，Nightmare或Protractor帮助器配对以进行浏览器测试。

trans-unit.source: GraphQLDataFactory (opens new window) helper.
trans-unit.target: GraphQLDataFactory（打开新窗口）帮助器。

trans-unit.source: REST helper (opens new window) allows sending raw HTTP requests to application. This is a tool to make shortcuts and create your data pragmatically via API. However, it doesn't provide tools for testing APIs, so it should be paired with WebDriver, Nightmare or Protractor helpers for browser testing.
trans-unit.target: REST帮助程序（打开新窗口）允许将原始HTTP请求发送到应用程序。这是一个制作快捷方式并通过API实用地创建数据的工具。但是，它不提供用于测试API的工具，因此应与WebDriver，Nightmare或Protractor帮助器配对以进行浏览器测试。

trans-unit.source: REST helper uses Unirest library to send HTTP requests to application. However, it doesn't provide tools for testing APIs, so it should be paired with WebDriverIO, Nightmare or Protractor helpers for browser testing.
trans-unit.target: REST帮助程序使用Unirest库将HTTP请求发送到应用程序。但是，它不提供用于测试API的工具，因此应与WebDriverIO，噩梦或量角器助手配对使用，以进行浏览器测试。

trans-unit.source: TestCafe (opens new window) is another alternative engine for driving browsers. It is driven by unique technology which provides fast and simple cross browser testing for desktop and mobile browsers. Unlike WebDriver or Puppeteer, TestCafe doesn't control a browser at all. It is not a browser itself, like Nightmare or Cypress. TestCafe core is a proxy server that runs behind the scene, and transforms all HTML and JS to include code that is needed for test automation.
trans-unit.target: TestCafe（在新窗口中打开）是用于驱动浏览器的另一种替代引擎。它由独特的技术驱动，可为台式机和移动浏览器提供快速，简单的跨浏览器测试。与WebDriver或Puppeteer不同，TestCafe根本不控制浏览器。它不是像Nightmare或Cypress这样的浏览器。TestCafe核心是在后台运行的代理服务器，并转换所有HTML和JS以包含测试自动化所需的代码。

trans-unit.source: grabTextFrom action is used here to retrieve text from an element. All actions starting with grab prefix are expected to return data. In order to synchronize this step with a scenario you should pause test execution with await keyword of ES6. To make it work your test should be written inside a async function (notice async in its definition).
trans-unit.target: grabTextFrom 此处使用grabTextFrom操作来从元素中检索文本。所有以 grab 前缀开头的操作均应返回数据。为了使此步骤与方案同步，您应该使用ES6的 await 关键字暂停测试执行。为了使其工作，您的测试应在异步函数内编写（请注意其定义中的 async ）。

trans-unit.source: heightnumber (opens new window) height in pixels.Unlike other drivers Playwright changes the size of a viewport, not the window! Playwright does not control the window of a browser so it can't adjust its real size. It also can't maximize a window.Update configuration to change real window size on start:```js // inside codecept.conf.js // @codeceptjs/configure package must be installed { setWindowSize } = require('@codeceptjs/configure');
trans-unit.target: height number（打开新窗口）以像素为单位的高度。与其他驱动程序不同，Playwright会更改视口的大小，而不是窗口的大小！Playwright无法控制浏览器的窗口，因此无法调整其实际大小。它也无法最大化窗口。在开始时更新配置以更改实际窗口大小：```js //必须在codecept.conf.js中// //必须安装@ codeceptjs / configure软件包{setWindowSize} = require（'@ codeceptjs /配置'）;

trans-unit.source: ignoredSteps - an array for custom steps to ignore on retry. Use it to append custom steps to ignored list. You can use step names or step prefixes ending with *. As such, wait* will match all steps starting with wait. To append your own steps to ignore list - copy and paste a default steps list. Regexp values are accepted as well.
trans-unit.target: ignoredSteps 用于在重试时忽略的自定义步骤的数组。使用它可以将自定义步骤附加到忽略列表。您可以使用以 * 结尾的步骤名称或步骤前缀。因此， wait* 将匹配从 wait 开始的所有步骤。要附加自己的步骤以忽略列表-复制并粘贴默认步骤列表。还接受正则表达式值。

trans-unit.source: async - means that event is fired when an actions is scheduled. Use recorder to schedule your actions.
trans-unit.target: 异步 -表示在安排操作后触发该事件。使用 recorder 安排您的行动。

trans-unit.source: sync - means that event is fired in the moment of action happens.
trans-unit.target: sync-表示在操作发生时触发事件。

trans-unit.source: Application mode - starts Electron application in a window. Designed for desktop systems.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序模式-在窗口中启动电子应用程序。专为桌面系统而设计。

trans-unit.source: Automatic - this plugin will create and manage selenoid container for you.
trans-unit.target: 自动-此插件将为您创建和管理硒油容器。

trans-unit.source: CodeceptJS can execute this scenario step by step as an automated test. Every step in this scenario requires a code which defines it.
trans-unit.target: CodeceptJS可以逐步执行此方案作为自动化测试。这种情况下的每个步骤都需要定义它的代码。

trans-unit.source: Extends Helper
trans-unit.target: 扩展助手

trans-unit.source: Extends WebdriverIO
trans-unit.target: 扩展WebdriverIO

trans-unit.source: Fast. Browser is controlled from inside a web page. This makes test run inside a browser as fast as your browser can render page with no extra network requests.
trans-unit.target: 快。浏览器是从网页内部控制的。这使得测试在浏览器中运行的速度与您的浏览器可以呈现页面的速度一样快，而无需额外的网络请求。

trans-unit.source: Follow corresponding guide >>
trans-unit.target: 遵循相应的指南>>

trans-unit.source: If you are using Windows machine or if autoCreate does not work properly, create container manually
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Windows计算机，或者 autoCreate 不能正常工作，请手动创建容器

trans-unit.source: Magic. Browsers executed in TestCafe are not aware that they run in test mode. So at some edges automation control can be broken. It's also quite hard to debug possible issues, as you don't know how actually a web page is parsed to inject automation scripts.
trans-unit.target: 魔法。在TestCafe中执行的浏览器不知道它们在测试模式下运行。因此，在某些方面，自动化控制可能会被破坏。调试可能的问题也非常困难，因为您不知道如何实际解析网页以注入自动化脚本。

trans-unit.source: Manual - you create the conatainer and configure it with a plugin (recommended).
trans-unit.target: 手册-创建容器，并使用插件进行配置（推荐）。

trans-unit.source: No Browser Control. Because TestCafe do not control browser, you can't actually automate all users actions. For instance, TestCafe can't open new tabs or open a new browser window in incognito mode. There can be also some issues running tests on 3rd party servers or inside iframes.
trans-unit.target: 没有浏览器控件。由于TestCafe不控制浏览器，因此您实际上无法自动执行所有用户操作。例如，TestCafe无法以隐身模式打开新选项卡或打开新的浏览器窗口。在第三方服务器或iframe上运行测试时，也可能会出现一些问题。

trans-unit.source: NodeJS v 8.9 and higher required to start. CodeceptJS is multi-backend testing framework. It can execute tests using different libraries like webdriverio, Puppeteer, Protractor, etc.
trans-unit.target: 必须启动NodeJS v 8.9及更高版本。CodeceptJS是多后端测试框架。它可以使用不同的库（例如webdriverio，Puppeteer，量角器等）执行测试。

trans-unit.source: Server mode - starts a webserver. Deigned for CI systems.
trans-unit.target: 服务器模式-启动Web服务器。设计用于CI系统。

trans-unit.source: Simple Cross-Browser Support. Because TestCafe only launches browsers, it can automate browser on desktop or mobile. Unlike WebDriver, you don't need special version of browser and driver to prepare to run tests. Setup simplified. All you need is just a browser installed, and you are ready to go.
trans-unit.target: 简单的跨浏览器支持。由于TestCafe仅启动浏览器，因此它可以使台式机或移动设备上的浏览器自动化。与WebDriver不同，您不需要特殊版本的浏览器和驱动程序即可准备运行测试。简化安装。您只需要安装一个浏览器，即可开始使用。

trans-unit.source: Simulated Events. Events like click or doubleClick are simulated by JavaScript internally. Inside WebDriver or Puppeteer, where those events are dispatched by a browser, called native events. Native events are closer to real user experience. So in some cases simulated events wouldn't represent actual user experience, which can lead to false positive results. For instance, a button which can't be physically clicked by a user, would be clickable inside TestCafe.
trans-unit.target: 模拟事件。诸如 click 或 doubleClick 之类的事件是由JavaScript内部模拟的。在WebDriver或Puppeteer内部，这些事件是由浏览器调度的，称为本机事件。本地事件更接近真实的用户体验。因此，在某些情况下，模拟事件不会代表实际的用户体验，这可能会导致错误的肯定结果。例如，用户无法实际单击的按钮将在TestCafe内部单击。

trans-unit.source: Stable to Execution. Because a test is executed inside a browser, the network latency effects are reduced. Unlike WebDriver you won't hit stale element exceptions, or element not interactable exceptions, as from within a web browser all DOM elements are accessible.
trans-unit.target: 稳定执行。由于测试是在浏览器内部执行的，因此可以减少网络延迟的影响。与WebDriver不同，您不会遇到过时的元素异常或元素不可交互的异常，因为从Web浏览器中可以访问所有DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: WebDriver has limited ability to mock requests, so you can only mock only requests performed after page is loaded. This means that you can't block Google Analytics, or CDN calls, but you can mock API requests performed on user action.

trans-unit.source: Acceptance (also called End to End) tests can cover standard but complex scenarios from a user's perspective. With acceptance tests you can be confident that users, following all defined scenarios, won't get errors. We check not just functionality of application but a user interface (UI) as well.
trans-unit.target: 从用户的角度来看，验收（也称为端到端）测试可以涵盖标准但复杂的场景。使用验收测试，您可以确信，在所有定义的方案下，用户都不会出错。我们不仅检查应用程序的功能，而且检查用户界面（UI）。

trans-unit.source: Acceptance Testing
trans-unit.target: 验收测试

trans-unit.source: Acceptance tests interact with a websites using UI and real browser. There is no way to create data for a specific test other than from user interface. That makes tests slow and fragile. Instead of testing a single feature you need to follow all creation/removal process.
trans-unit.target: 验收测试是使用用户界面和真实的浏览器与网站进行交互。除了用户界面,没有办法为特定的测试创建数据。这使得测试变得缓慢而脆弱。而不是测试一个单一的功能,你需要遵循所有的创建/删除过程。

trans-unit.source: All helpers share the same API so it's easy to migrate tests from one backend to other. However, because of difference in backends and their limitations, they are not guarantted to compatible between each other. For instance, you can't set request headers in WebDriverIO or Protractor, but you can do so in Puppteer or Nigthmare.
trans-unit.target: 所有的帮助程序都共享相同的API,所以很容易将测试从一个后端迁移到另一个后端。然而,由于后端的不同和它们的局限性,它们之间并不能保证兼容。例如,你不能在WebDriverIO或Protractor中设置请求头,但你可以在Puppteer或Nigthmare中这样做。

trans-unit.source: All helpers share the same API, so it's easy to migrate tests from one backend to another. However, because of the difference in backends and their limitations, they are not guaranteed to be compatible with each other. For instance, you can't set request headers in WebDriver or Protractor, but you can do so in Puppteer or Nightmare.
trans-unit.target: 所有的帮助程序都共享相同的API,所以很容易将测试从一个后端迁移到另一个后端。然而,由于后端的不同和它们的限制,它们并不能保证相互兼容。例如,你不能在WebDriver或Protractor中设置请求头,但你可以在Puppteer或Nightmare中这样做。

trans-unit.source: All the REST, GraphQL, GraphQLDataFactory, and ApiDataFactory helpers allow override requests before sending. This feature can be used to fetch current browser cookies and set them to REST API or GraphQL client. By doing this we can make requests within the current browser session without a need of additional authentication.
trans-unit.target: 所有的REST、GraphQL、GraphQLDataFactory和ApiDataFactory助手都允许在发送之前覆盖请求。这个功能可以用来获取当前的浏览器cookie,并将其设置为REST API或GraphQL客户端。通过这样做,我们可以在当前的浏览器会话中进行请求,而不需要额外的认证。

trans-unit.source: Allure is a great reportin tool, however, if you are running tests on different machines it is hard to merge its XML result files to build a proper report. So, for enterprise grade reporting we recommend using ReportPortal (opens new window).

trans-unit.source: Also you can replace real request with a one explicitly defined. This is useful when you want to isolate application testing from a backend. For instance, if you don't want to save data to database, and you know the request which performs save, you can mock the request, so application will treat this as valid response, but no data will be actually saved.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以用一个明确定义的请求来代替真实请求。当你想把应用测试与后端隔离时,这很有用。例如,如果你不想将数据保存到数据库中,而你又知道执行保存的请求,你可以模拟这个请求,这样应用程序会将其视为有效的响应,但不会实际保存数据。

trans-unit.source: Among all Selenium alternatives the most interesting emerging ones are tools developed around Google Chrome DevTools Protocol (opens new window). And the most prominent one is Puppeteer (opens new window). It operates over Google Chrome directly without requiring additional tools like ChromeDriver. So tests setup with Puppeteer can be started with npm install only. If you want get faster and simpler to setup tests, Puppeteer would be your choice.
trans-unit.target: 在所有硒替代品中，最有趣的新兴替代品是围绕Google Chrome DevTools协议开发的工具（打开新窗口）。而最突出的一个是Puppeteer（在新窗口中打开）。它可以直接在Google Chrome上运行，而无需其他工具，例如ChromeDriver。因此，只能使用npm install来启动使用Puppeteer进行的测试设置。如果您想更快，更简单地设置测试，则可以选择Puppeteer。

trans-unit.source: Assertions start with see prefix. You can check text on a page, elements on page and others.
trans-unit.target: 断言以 see 前缀开头。您可以检查页面上的文本，页面上的元素等。

trans-unit.source: Asserts that an element appears a given number of times in the DOM. Element is located by label or name or CSS or XPath.

trans-unit.source: Asserts that an element is visible a given number of times. Element is located by CSS or XPath.
trans-unit.target: 断言一个元素在给定的次数下是可见的。元素由CSS或XPath定位。

trans-unit.source: At first, you need data generation libraries which are Rosie (opens new window) and Faker (opens new window). Faker can generate random names, emails, texts, and Rosie uses them to generate objects using factories.
trans-unit.target: 首先，您需要数据生成库，它们是Rosie（打开新窗口）和Faker（打开新窗口）。Faker可以生成随机名称，电子邮件，文本，Rosie使用它们来使用工厂生成对象。

trans-unit.source: At initialization you were asked to create custom steps file. If you accepted this option you may use custom_steps.js file to extend I. See how login method can be added to I:

trans-unit.source: At the end of a test ApiDataFactory will clean up created record for you. This is done by collecting ids from crated records and running DELETE /api/users/{id} requests at the end of a test. This rules can be customized in helper configuration.
trans-unit.target: 测试结束时，ApiDataFactory将为您清除创建的记录。这是通过从创建的记录中收集ID并在测试结束时运行 DELETE /api/users/{id} 请求来完成的。可以在助手配置中自定义此规则。

trans-unit.source: At the end of a test GraphQLDataFactory will clean up created record for you. This is done by collecting data from crated records, creating deletion mutation objects by passing the data to the revert function provided, and sending deletion mutation objects as requests at the end of a test. This behavior is according the revert function be customized in helper configuration. The revert function returns an object, that contains the query for deletion, and the variables object to go along with it.
trans-unit.target: 在测试结束时，GraphQLDataFactory将为您清理创建的记录。这是通过从创建的记录中收集数据，通过将数据传递到提供的 revert 功能来创建删除突变对象以及在测试结束时作为请求发送删除突变对象来完成的。此行为是根据 revert 功能在助手配置中自定义的。还原功能返回一个对象，该对象包含要删除的查询，以及与之一起使用的变量对象。

trans-unit.source: At this moment works only with Puppeteer
trans-unit.target: 目前只适用于Puppeteer。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a file to element located by label, name, CSS or XPath Path to file is relative current codecept directory (where codecept.json is located). File will be uploaded to remote system (if tests are running remotely).

trans-unit.source: BDD encourages exploration and debate in order to formalize the requirements and the features that needs to be implemented by requesting to write the User Stories in a way that everyone can understand.

trans-unit.source: BDD has its own evolution from the days it was born, started by replacing "test" to "should" in unit tests, and moving towards powerful tools like Cucumber and Behat, which made user stories (human readable text) to be executed as an acceptance test.
trans-unit.target: BDD从诞生之日起就有自己的进化,从单元测试中的 "测试 "改为 "应该 "开始,到Cucumber和Behat这样强大的工具,让用户故事(人类可读的文本)作为验收测试来执行。

trans-unit.source: Behavior Driven Development
trans-unit.target: 行为驱动发展

trans-unit.source: Behavior Driven Development (BDD) is a popular software development methodology. BDD is considered an extension of TDD, and is greatly inspired by Agile (opens new window) practices. The primary reason to choose BDD as your development process is to break down communication barriers between business and technical teams. BDD encourages the use of automated testing to verify all documented features of a project from the very beginning. This is why it is common to talk about BDD in the context of test frameworks (like CodeceptJS). The BDD approach, however, is about much more than testing - it is a common language for all team members to use during the development process.
trans-unit.target: 行为驱动开发（BDD）是一种流行的软件开发方法。BDD被认为是TDD的扩展，并且受到敏捷（在新窗口中打开）实践的启发。选择BDD作为您的开发过程的主要原因是打破业务和技术团队之间的沟通障碍。BDD鼓励从一开始就使用自动化测试来验证项目的所有文档化功能。这就是为什么在测试框架（如CodeceptJS）的上下文中经常谈论BDD的原因。但是，BDD方法远不止是测试-它是所有团队成员在开发过程中使用的通用语言。

trans-unit.source: Behavior Driven Development (BDD) is a popular software development methodology. BDD is considered an extension of TDD, and is greatly inspired by Agile practices. The primary reason to choose BDD as your development process is to break down communication barriers between business and technical teams. BDD encourages the use of automated testing to verify all documented features of a project from the very beginning. This is why it is common to talk about BDD in the context of test frameworks (like CodeceptJS). The BDD approach, however, is about much more than testing - it is a common language for all team members to use during the development process.
trans-unit.target: 行为驱动开发（BDD）是一种流行的软件开发方法。BDD被认为是TDD的扩展，并且受到敏捷实践的极大启发。选择BDD作为您的开发过程的主要原因是要打破业务和技术团队之间的沟通障碍。BDD鼓励从一开始就使用自动化测试来验证项目的所有文档功能。这就是为什么在测试框架（如CodeceptJS）的上下文中经常谈论BDD的原因。但是，BDD方法远不止是测试-它是所有团队成员在开发过程中使用的通用语言。
